channel.title: RuneCentre - 2006 RuneScape Remake
channel.description:
[ul][CENTER][IMG]http://runecentre.com/img/title2/rslogo3.gif[/img] [b]This project was start on Monday, May 13, 2013 and is PI based and always will be.[/b] [/CENTER] [HR]
[s]Project F2P[/s] RuneCentre is a full Free To Play RuneScape remake. We aim to bring back the good day's of F2P RuneScape. We are fully aware that Jagex has released two F2P worlds on their 07, but you still have to be a member to play on them? Well that's where Project F2P comes in. We bring the same thing Jagex is bringing to you, but what's different is that we are based on the year 2006 rather than 2007 which most people said was to new, but what makes us even better is that's it's 100% [b]FREE[/b]. So before you start to flame on another 2006 remake please take to mind what you just read.
[hr]
The [b]red[/b] color code means the feature has not yet been started. The [b]orange[/b] color code means the feature has been started and is under construction. The [b]green[/b] color code means the feature has been finished.
[b]Updates in progress:[/b] - The Knight's Sword - Vampire Slayer - Combat re-work
[b]Latest updates:[/b] - Pottery (un-fired & fired) - Gem cutting - Tanning - Leather making - Spinning wheel - Dough making - Fishing - Music tab & music unlocking - Tutorial Island - Combat clipping - Runecrafting - Witch's Potion - Cooking - Sheep shearing - Sheep Shearer quest - Doric's quest
[list] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [b]Combat:[/b] [list][li]PvP fully complete[/li] [li]PvN fully complete[/li] [li]Equipment requirements[/li] [li]Perfect max hit formulas[/li] [li]Perfect accuracy formula[/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [b]Magic:[/b] [list] [li]Every F2P Modern spell[/li] [li]Can't mage through walls[/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [b]Range:[/b] [list] [li]All bow/arrows working[/li] [li]Can't range through walls[/li] [li]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [b]Prayer:[/b] [list] [li]All F2P bones bury-able[/li] [li]All F2P prayers working correctly[/li] [li]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b]Mining:[/b] [list] [li]Empty and refilling rocks[/li] [li]All ore can be mined[/li] [li]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/li] [li]Prospecting[/li] [li]Random chance of obtaining gems[/li] [li]Correct re-spawn time[/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [b]Smithing:[/b] [list] [li]All bars can be made[/li] [li]All bars can be forged into items[/li] [li]All F2P equipment can be produced[/li] [li]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b]Fishing:[/b] [list] [li]All F2P fish can be cought[/li] [li]All F2P fishing locations[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li] [li]Moving fishing locations[/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [b]Cooking:[/b] [list] [li]Bread[/li] [li]Pizza[/li] [li]Pie[/li] [li]Cake[/li] [li]Dough making[/li] [li]Meat[/li] [li]Correct animation and timing used[/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] [b]Woodcutting:[/b] [list] [li]All tree's cut-able[/li] [li]Stumps & re-growing tree's[/li] [li]Correct axe finding & animations[/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [b]Firemaking:[/b] [list] [li]All F2P logs light-able[/li] [li]Correct ground objects ( log while lighting & fire )[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li] [li]Ashes[/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b]Crafting:[/b] [list] [li]Leather making[/li] [li]Tanning[/li] [li]Spinning wool[/li] [li]Pottery (fired and un-fired items)[/li] [li]Gem cutting[/li] [li]Jewelry making[/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [b]Runecrafting:[/b] [list] [li]All F2P altars working[/li] [li]Correct multiple crafting[/li] [li]Talismans "pull" to altars[/li] [li]Tiaras[/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [b]Music & sounds:[/b] [list] [li]All skilling sounds[/li] [li]All combat sounds[/li] [li]Working music tab & music unlocking[/li] [li]Music in all F2P regions[/li] [li]Music fade while changing region's[/li] [li]Working volume control[/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [b]Quest:[/b] [list] [li]Tutorial Island[/li] [li]Black Knights' Fortress[/li] [li]Cook's Assistant[/li] [li]Demon Slayer[/li] [li]Doric's Quest[/li] [li]Dragon Slayer[/li] [li]Ernest the Chicken[/li] [li]Goblin Diplomacy[/li] [li]Imp Catcher[/li] [li]The Knight's sword[/li] [li]Pirate's Treasure[/li] [li]Prince Ali Rescure[/li] [li]The Restless Ghost[/li] [li]Romeo & Juliet[/li] [li]Rune Mysteries Quest[/li] [li]Sheep Shearer[/li] [li]Vampire Slayer[/li] [li]Witch's Potion[/li] [/list]
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img] [b]Random events: [list] [li]Yet to come... [/list]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] [b]Misc.:[/b] [list] [li]Hiscores[/li] [li]Server integration[/li] [li]Pickables[/li] [li]Flour mill[/li] [li]Working door's[/li] [li]Working gate's[/li] [li]Working stairs[/li] [li]Working ladders[/li] [li]Global drops[/li] [li][b]More to come...[/b][/li] [/list]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ey9cb5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2v30t8z.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/x2mgdf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2w314k0.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/3500yg5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/dblg82.png[/img]

[b]Credits:[/b] - PI - Lostmyphat ( thread layout ) - Me[/list][/ul]

item.title: RuneCentre - 2006 RuneScape Remake
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Fire capez, post:59, topic:519579”]first server i’ve seen utilize the membership byte sent to the server during login, the ‘members only’ items are pretty easy tho you just pass free as the parameter instead of members (Make sure you validate that you don’t want people changing it and then getting access to members items on the f2p server somehow)[/quote]he quit lol

first server i’ve seen utilize the membership byte sent to the server during login, the ‘members only’ items are pretty easy tho you just pass free as the parameter instead of members (Make sure you validate that you don’t want people changing it and then getting access to members items on the f2p server somehow)

item.title: RuneCentre - 2006 RuneScape Remake
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:47, topic:519579”]No vain. The only reason I really said that was because everyone says they are trying to make PI better but it cant be done without making a new server![/quote]contrary to popular belief: any code can in fact be improved to be more efficient, more stable, and more conscious to quality.

it all lies within the user’s will to learn, attempts to improve, and knowledge on the matter at hand.

though, we can agree the a project insanity (or any winterlove-derived base) has quite a fuckload of poorly written code, content, and a horrible design concept.

with the amount of time taken to effectively improve it’s footprint, you could have already written a new, properly written/better designed framework (given you have the knowledge/can read the wiki/client)

it’s all a matter of "do"s and "don’t"s, not "can"s and "can’t"s

Read full topic

item.title: RuneCentre - 2006 RuneScape Remake
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:47, topic:519579”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=638044.msg4311175#msg4311175 date=1370754574]

Base (presuming the aging, horrible PI)?

PI yes, but our developer Daniel is currently improving the core. Also almost everything has or is currently being re-wrote.

Of course he is…
[/quote]yes. you may want to provide some type of ‘code’ to insure improvements or just information on how you handle cycles/ticks; where you be cycle based/event driven/task driven/whatever it may be. provide some details on how the core was improved/what was actually improved about it.

rewriting code is not always better<<

No vain. The only reason I really said that was because everyone says they are trying to make PI better but it cant be done without making a new server![/quote]

Not trying to make PI better, just making it more stable. Also once some core features get done I’ll post them.

Read full topic
